about_the_game:
Transform your mischievous monkeys into enchanting anime girls with the Monkey Party - Anime Girls DLC! Step into a whimsical world where your beloved simians take on a whole new persona, adorned in delightful anime-inspired attire. Each character retains their unique quirks and abilities, now with a captivating anime twist.

Features:

Anime Girl Transformations: Witness your monkeys metamorphose into charming anime girls, each with their own distinctive style and animations.

Enhanced Visual Delights: Immerse yourself in upgraded visuals that bring the anime magic to life.

Experience the whimsy and wonder of Monkey Party - Anime Girls DLC, where playful antics meet irresistible anime allure!

name: Monkey Party - Anime Girls
short_description: Tired of the boring monkeys? Transform your gameplay with Monkey Party - Anime Girls DLC! Watch as your cheeky primates evolve into captivating anime characters, each bringing their own flair and charm to the party. Dive into a world where mischief meets anime allure and embark on new adventures
